channel.title: Vsan on VirtualMachinery
channel.description: Recent content in Vsan on VirtualMachinery

item.title: VSAN 6.1 and 6.NEXT
item.description: Cormac Hogan has posted a couple of blog posts in the last 24 hours detailing the new features offered by the newly announced (today?) release of VSAN 6.1 and also lifted the veil somewhat on what can be expected in the next release, including another VSAN beta signup offer. Whatever you may think about the adoption rates for VSAN there’s no arguing with the pace of development coming out of VMware for this technology.
